title: Best of The Herd: 01/01/19
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 01/01/19
description:
Colin discusses why Pittsburgh Steelers WR Antonio Brown needs to grow up, the available NFL Head Coaching positions and why Cleveland shouldn't be the top choice, the new Herd Hierarchy, and Former NFL WR Greg Jennings stops by to talk about the drama going on in Pittsburgh. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
